mapper.select: SELECT t3.username ,t3.nickname ,t2.data_id ,t2.title ,t2.create_date ,t2.synopsis,t1.type FROM `dts_collect` t1 inner join ( select article_id data_id,title,author_id,create_date,synopsis from dts_article union select video_id data_id,title,author_id,create_date,synopsis from dts_video ) t2 on t1.data_id = t2.data_id inner join uts_author t3 on t3.username = #{username} and t1.author_id = t3.author_id order by t2.create_date desc
